settings.label: Our Legacy
settings.subtext: Since 1892, our atelier has been dedicated to the pursuit of perfection. Each piece represents centuries of craftsmanship tradition.

settings.label: The Atelier
settings.title: A Heritage of Excellence
settings.text: For over a century, our master craftsmen have dedicated their lives to the art of fine jewelry and luxury accessories. Each piece is meticulously handcrafted using time-honored techniques passed down through five generations, combined with the finest materials sourced from around the world.

settings.title: The Foundation
settings.text: Established in Paris by master jeweler Henri Laurent with a vision for uncompromising excellence.

settings.title: Royal Appointment
settings.text: Received our first royal commission, establishing relationships that continue to this day.

settings.title: Global Expansion
settings.text: Opened flagship ateliers in London, New York, and Hong Kong.

settings.title: Continuing Excellence
settings.text: Five generations later, our commitment to craftsmanship remains unwavering.
